description: This file sets up and manages the main process of an Electron application, creating a browser window, loading either a development server URL or a local HTML file, and handling app lifecycle events.

classes.name: BrowserWindow
classes.description: Represents a browser window in the Electron application, used to load and display content.

classes.name: app
classes.description: Controls the application's lifecycle events, including readiness and window activation.

methods.name: createWindow
methods.description: Creates a new Electron BrowserWindow with specified configurations and loads the appropriate URL or file based on environment.
